text: Then in answer Jesus said: “O unbelieving and perverseWhy “perverse”? To reject the truth and the evidence is to be perverse. This word was presumably directed to the disciples, who should have known better by now. So how about us—are we living on the basis of the truth and the evidence? Really? generation, how long shall I be with you and put up with you (pl)? Bring your (sg) son here!”
